node.excerpt: Data: Darwin's finches on Daphne Major Island. Methods: Graphical and quantitative EDA, parameter estimation, confidence interval calculation & hypothesis testing. An analysis of evolutionary data of finches scandens and fortis. This is a my own take…

A summary of various DataCamp.com mini projects I completed as part of my introduction to data science. The project titles link to the Jupyter notebooks. Bad passwords and the NIST guidelines Data: fictional user database Methods: Cleaning data…
